name: Stargazing
description:
Stargazing is an experimental flatgame created by Tristan Damron (@twomo_). Henry, the protagonist of Stargazing, reminds us that when confronted with evil the only remedy is compassion and empathy. Stargazing experiments with a collage of classical pieces from the British Library against modern visual effects and progressive ambient music.

Donations are greatly appreciated, but never required or expected. To donate, click the Support This Game button on this page. With your donation, you will also receive a copy of Stargazing for Windows.

Controls: WASD (movement)

Game Jam Submission(s): Flatgame Jam 2021

(If you are interested in the sheet music or source code for this game, please contact me via Twitter @twomo_)
